jparsec.graph

Class CreateChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.graph.CreateChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CreateChart
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Creates a chart using JFreeChart or GILDAS.

    Charts can be created from a ChartElement or a SimpleChartElement objects. Once created they can be visualize using either the JFreeChart original panel or a default panel defined in Picture.

    When using a JFreeChart panel, you will get some advantages like automatic resize of the chart, point labels when setting the mouse on a given point, and an emerging window (right mouse click) with some options. However, sub-charts will not be visible.

    When using a default panel, you will be able to see a sub-chart (a little chart inside the main one) if the sub-chart was defined in the ChartElement object. Another advantage is the automatic update of the chart, without calling any method. In this default panel the width of the chart should be equal to the height.

    It is also possible to export the chart to the following formats: JPG, PNG, EPS, SVG, and PDF.

    The JFreechart version used here is a modified version of the original. The JCommon library was modified to support subscripts and superscripts usually required to properly draw scientific charts.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • showChartInJFreeChartPanelWithAdvancedControls

        public void showChartInJFreeChartPanelWithAdvancedControls()
                                                    throws JPARSECException
        Shows the main chart in an JFreeChart panel including key controls to modify the chart. Left and right cursor keys to show more or less series, and up/down to show labels with a greater/lower font size. Q key to lose focus.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

        public static CreateChart createSimpleChart(double[] x,
                            double[] y,
                            java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String xlabel,
                            java.lang.String ylabel,

                            boolean logscale)
                                     throws JPARSECException
        Creates a simple chart from a set of values.
        Parameters:
        x - X values.
        y - Y values.
        legend - Legend text. Empty string implies no legend
        title - Chart title.
        xlabel - X axis label.
        ylabel - Y axis label.
        logscale - True to create a log scale chart.
        Returns:
        The chart.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • exportAsScriptForGILDAS

        public java.lang.String exportAsScriptForGILDAS(java.lang.String fileName,
                                       CreateChart.GILDAS_LEYEND leyendPosition,
                                       boolean autoDestroy)
                                         throws JPARSECException
        Creates a script to draw the current chart using GILDAS. Only the most simple charts (x-y scattering and category) are fully supported, with limitations on colors and line strokes, among others.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the postscript file to be created, with path.
        leyendPosition - Position of the leyend, constants defined in class CreateChart.GILDAS_LEYEND.
        autoDestroy - True to add commands to autodestroy the script.
        Returns:
        The contents of the script.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • toGILDASformat

        public static java.lang.String toGILDASformat(java.lang.String label)
        Transforms a given string with subindex, superindex, or greek letters from JPARSEC to GILDAS format.
        Parameters:
        label - A string in the JPARSEC format.
        Returns:
        The string in the GILDAS format.

      • exportAsSuperScriptForGILDAS

        public static void exportAsSuperScriptForGILDAS(CreateChart[] charts,
                                int nx,
                                int ny,
                                java.lang.String[] names,
                                java.lang.String superName,
                                java.lang.String dir,
                                CreateChart.GILDAS_LEYEND leyendPosition,
                                boolean drawTitles,
                                boolean autoDestroy)
                                         throws JPARSECException
        Creates a panel with several charts for GILDAS, with no separation between the charts and always the same ratio.
        Parameters:
        charts - The charts.
        nx - The number of chartx in the x axis.
        ny - The number of charts in the y axis.
        names - The names of the different output files for the charts.
        superName - The name of the main GILDAS panel.
        dir - Path to the output directory.
        leyendPosition - The position of the leyend in the charts.
        drawTitles - True to draw titles slightly inside the charts.
        autoDestroy - True to add commands to autodestroy the script.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • exportAsSuperScriptForGILDAS

        public static void exportAsSuperScriptForGILDAS(CreateChart[] charts,
                                int nx,
                                int ny,
                                java.lang.String[] names,
                                java.lang.String superName,
                                java.lang.String dir,
                                CreateChart.GILDAS_LEYEND leyendPosition,
                                boolean drawTitles,
                                boolean autoDestroy,
                                boolean drawPanelIndex,
                                boolean panelIndexAsNumber)
                                         throws JPARSECException
        Creates a panel with several charts for GILDAS, with no separation between the charts and always the same ratio.
        Parameters:
        charts - The charts.
        nx - The number of chartx in the x axis.
        ny - The number of charts in the y axis.
        names - The names of the different output files for the charts.
        superName - The name of the main GILDAS panel.
        dir - Path to the output directory.
        leyendPosition - The position of the leyend in the charts.
        drawTitles - True to draw titles slightly inside the charts.
        autoDestroy - True to add commands to autodestroy the script.
        drawPanelIndex - True to draw panel label as a character or number.
        panelIndexAsNumber - True to draw panel label as a character.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • exportAsSuperScriptForGILDAS

        public static void exportAsSuperScriptForGILDAS(CreateChart[] charts,
                                int nx,
                                int ny,
                                java.lang.String[] names,
                                java.lang.String superName,
                                java.lang.String dir,
                                CreateChart.GILDAS_LEYEND leyendPosition,
                                boolean drawTitles,
                                boolean autoDestroy,
                                boolean drawPanelIndex,
                                boolean panelIndexAsNumber,
                                boolean sameRatio,
                                int sepx,
                                int sepy)
                                         throws JPARSECException
        Creates a panel with several charts for GILDAS. Titles are drawn outside the chart area.
        Parameters:
        charts - The charts.
        nx - The number of chartx in the x axis.
        ny - The number of charts in the y axis.
        names - The names of the different output files for the charts.
        superName - The name of the main GILDAS panel.
        dir - Path to the output directory.
        leyendPosition - The position of the leyend in the charts.
        drawTitles - True to draw titles slightly inside the charts.
        autoDestroy - True to add commands to autodestroy the script.
        drawPanelIndex - True to draw panel label as a character or number.
        panelIndexAsNumber - True to draw panel label as a character.
        sameRatio - true to produce charts with the same ratio always.
        sepx - separation between the charts in x axis, as a percentage of the width of each chart (0 to 100).
        sepy - separation between the charts in y axis, as a percentage of the height of each chart (0 to 100).
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • exportAsSuperScriptForGILDAS

        public static void exportAsSuperScriptForGILDAS(CreateChart[] charts,
                                int nx,
                                int ny,
                                java.lang.String[] names,
                                java.lang.String superName,
                                java.lang.String dir,
                                CreateChart.GILDAS_LEYEND leyendPosition,
                                boolean drawTitles,
                                boolean autoDestroy,
                                boolean drawPanelIndex,
                                boolean panelIndexAsNumber,
                                boolean sameRatio,
                                int sepx,
                                int sepy,
                                boolean axisRangeAlways,
                                boolean titlesInside)
                                         throws JPARSECException
        Creates a panel with several charts for GILDAS.
        Parameters:
        charts - The charts.
        nx - The number of chartx in the x axis.
        ny - The number of charts in the y axis.
        names - The names of the different output files for the charts.
        superName - The name of the main GILDAS panel.
        dir - Path to the output directory.
        leyendPosition - The position of the leyend in the charts.
        drawTitles - True to draw titles slightly outside or inside (see last input parameter) the chart top limit.
        autoDestroy - True to add commands to autodestroy the script.
        drawPanelIndex - True to draw panel label as a character or number.
        panelIndexAsNumber - True to draw panel label as a character.
        sameRatio - true to produce charts with the same ratio always.
        sepx - separation between the charts in x axis, as a percentage of the width of each chart (0 to 100).
        sepy - separation between the charts in y axis, as a percentage of the height of each chart (0 to 100).
        axisRangeAlways - True to show the range of values in the axes always.
        titlesInside - True to show the tittles of each chart slightly inside the chart area, false to show them outside.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

        The chart.

      • getPhysicalUnits

        public static double[] getPhysicalUnits(org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel panel,
                        java.awt.Point p)
        Transforms mouse position in a chart to physical units.
        Parameters:
        panel - The ChartPanel object.
        p - Mouse position in the ChartPanel component.
        Returns:
        Physical position, or null if it is not an x-y chart.

      • getPhysicalUnits

        public double[] getPhysicalUnits(double px,
                        double py)
        Transforms mouse position in a chart to physical units.
        Parameters:
        px - Mouse X position in an image exported from this instance.
        py - Mouse Y position in an image exported from this instance.
        Returns:
        Physical position, or null if it is not an x-y chart.

      • getJava2DUnits

        public double[] getJava2DUnits(double px,
                      double py)
        Transforms physical units to mouse position.
        Parameters:
        px - Physical x position.
        py - Physical y position.
        Returns:
        Mouse position x and y, or null if it is not an x-y chart.

      • setChartLimitsX

        public void setChartLimitsX(double min,
                   double max)
        Sets the chart limits in x axis. The chart must be of type XY.
        Parameters:
        min - Minimum X.
        max - Maximum X.

      • setChartLimitsY

        public void setChartLimitsY(double min,
                   double max)
        Sets the chart limits in y axis. The chart must be of type XY.
        Parameters:
        min - Minimum Y.
        max - Maximum Y.

      • prepareGraphics2D

        public void prepareGraphics2D(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                     boolean clip)
        'Prepares' a Graphics context so that it can be used to draw on a JFreeChart using physical and not Java coordinates.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphic instance corresponding to an image created using this class.
        clip - True to clip drawing operations inside the chart area.
